name: Chunky Hand Knitted Wool Scarflette
description:
This hand knitted wool scarflette is perfect for the upcoming cold season. It's chunky enough to cover your neck, yet soft enough to not irritate or scratch the skin. This particular scarflette is not designed to fit snug to the wearer's neck, making it ideal to wear over coats and jackets. 

This adorable scarflette features purple and oats colors blended together and is fastened with a discrete wooden toggle button. 

The scarflette is made with Berroco Peruvia wool, which is of excellent quality and is sure to last for years to come!
